benchmark_details.name: RACE
benchmark_details.overview: RACE is a new dataset for benchmark evaluation of methods in the reading comprehension task, consisting of near 28,000 passages and near 100,000 questions generated by human experts.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate machine learning systems' ability in reading comprehension tasks.

data.source: Extracted from English examinations designed for middle and high school students in China.
data.annotation: Questions and answers generated and annotated by human experts.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated based on the proportion of correctly answered questions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in reading comprehension tasks.
methodology.validation: 5% of the data is used as a development set and 5% as a test set.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data collected under educational assessment contexts, ensuring anonymity of individuals.
